channel.title: Women in Computer Science @ Columbia University
channel.description: WiCS aims to bring together women and men who support the advancement of women in computer science in academia and in industry. We support and encourage prospective computer science majors and provide direction and assistance to current computer science students.

item.title: Hello World, WiCS!
item.description:
Welcome to our blog.

This is our new home on the web where we will be posting news, events, photos and more. We will post all updates to our Facebook page as well, but this will be a nice space for us to organize and archive all of our past events.

Enjoy!
